nodes.text: A poncho was an article of clothing worn by beings on planets such as Tatooine and Endor used for blending in with the wearer's environment or for style. Individuals that were known to have worn a poncho included Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn; Jedi Padawan Anakin Skywalker; Padawan Ahsoka Tano; Princess Leia Organa Solo; and the moisture farmer Luke Skywalker. The camouflage poncho was a type of poncho.
